### Adding new project to git



```{r}
#Step 1 :Go to your github account create new repository.
#Step 2 :In R studio click on File ---> New project
#Step 3 :Click on version control ---> Git
#Step 4 :Then click on new project
#Step 5 :After new project is created go to README file in the project
#Step 6 :Make changes to the file, save it
#Step 7 :On Right hand corner click on git tab, select the README file and then click on commit
#Step 8 :Write a commit message in commit window and then click on commit.
#Step 9 :Click on push button in this window to push the recent changes to the Github
```
